title: Black Screen Pixel 2
content: Black screen, tried Power+Volume Down, Power for 30 seconds, non of them work. It used to show the Bootloader image and suddenly went black. Was showing slot unbootable https://i.imgur.com/EjhDoSi.jpg then is black. Followed this post no luck any advise? https://support.google.com/techstop/answer/2707655?hl=en&ref_topic=3203468
